name: Architech
tag_list: custom-software, mobile-applications, software-design, software-developers, salesforce-developers, agile, scrum, lean-methods
overview:
Architech is a custom software design and engineering company. We create great-looking web, mobile and business applications integrated with back-end systems that drive organizations forward.

Our 85+ talented staff are organized into six practices:

  • Strategy: product definition, architecture and information design
  • Design: graphics, user experience, usability testing
  • Web applications: social, collaboration, cloud, content management, mobile, portals, ecommerce, web technologies
  • Services & integration: service oriented architecture, payment, identity management, cloud platforms, database
  • Salesforce: Salesforce.com, marketing automation
  • Search & information discovery: business intelligence, analytics, reporting, visualization, data mining, search, open data

Since inception in 2004, Architech’s 100+ projects have been successful through small team deployments that follow an agile process emphasizing collaboration, software engineering best practices, and incremental software delivery. We help clients understand how technology can best solve their business needs - and then create the right solution.

Specialties Agile, Search & Information Discovery, Web Applications, Mobile Web Applications, Web Services, Salesforce.com, Development, Software-as-a-Service, Cloud, Systems Integration
